#AskBQ is BloombergQuint’s daily offering where market experts help investors make the right investment choice — be it in equities, commodities or the derivatives markets.On Monday’s episode, Parthiv Shah,director at TRACOM Stock Brokers Pvt Ltd. and Kiran Jadhav, chairman and managing director of Kiran Jadhav & Associates gave their views on Reliance Industries, AB Capital, Idea Cellular and many more stocks.






Watch the full conversation:











Edited excerpts from the conversation:






Ankit Mishra: I bought 500 shares of Karnataka Bank at Rs 165 with a long-term view. Should I hold or sell?Parthiv Shah: I would recommend you to hold from an internet perspective. 






Alok Tiwari: I bought 90 shares of Avenue Supermarts at Rs 610 with a five-year view. Should I hold or sell?Parthiv Shah: You can hold on to your investment. 






Girish Kumar: I want to invest in Just Dial with a six-month view. Is it the right time to invest?Kiran Jadhav: Yes, but with a stop-loss at Rs 460.






Dexter Devitto: I want to invest in Idea Cellular with a long-term view. Is it the right time to invest?Parthiv Shah: Yes. 






Siddhartha Bhagat: I want to invest in Reliance Home Finance and AB Capital with a long-term view. Please advise.Parthiv Shah: AB Capital is a good bet.






Harsha Vardhan: I want to invest in markets with a long-term view. Please advice some mid-cap stocks.Parthiv Shah: I recommend you to invest in Capacit’e Infra and AB Capital.






Kiran Jadhav: I suggest you put your money in Cholamandalam Finance and TCS.






Bhabhani Shankar Behera: What is your view on Rain Industries?Kiran Jadhav: I recommend you to buy with a stop loss of Rs 370 if you are a high-risk investor or else I recommend you to avoid it at the moment. 






Balaji Srinivas: What is your view on Yes Bank?Kiran Jadhav: I recommend you to buy at current levels with a stop loss of Rs 295.






Kirti Mishra: I bought ITC at Rs 274. What is your view?Kiran Jadhav: I recommend you to hold for now and buy after the stock crosses the Rs 275 mark. 






Harsha Vardhan: What are your views on RBL Bank and Indian Bank?Kiran Jadhav: I recommend you to buy RBL Bank with a target of Rs 540 and have a stop loff below Rs 400 mark if you are holding the stock for Indian Bank.






Prem Sagar: What is your view on VIP Industries and Pidillite?Parthiv Shah: I recommend you to avoid VIP Industries and hold Pidillite.






Harsha Vardhan: What is your view on Max Financial?Parthiv Shah: I recommend you to hold for the long run.






Raj Shah: I have been holding Sona Koyo Steering Systems and my buying price is 80, should I book a profit or continue to hold for long term ?Parthiv Shah: I recommend you to hold for the next three to five years.






Biswajyoti Das: I bought 5,000 Shares of Dwarikesh Sugar Industries Ltd. at Rs 76/ with a six months view. What is your view?Kiran Jadhav: I recommend you to keep a stop loss of Rs 60.8.






Ravi Kumar: What is your view on Reliance Capital?Kiran Jadhav: I recommend you to exit.






Vimal Kumar: What is your view on Reliance Industries?Parthiv Shah: I recommend you to hold for the next three to five years.






Kiran Jadhav: I recommend you to accumulate until Rs 860 levels.
